original_title: Dancing on Thin Ice with Torvill & Dean
overview: Jayne Torvill and Christopher Dean travel to Alaska on an extraordinary quest to fulfil a life-long dream.  Ever since they were kids, they’ve wanted to skate free in nature, rather than round in circles on artificial ice. Now they’ve come to Alaska to make that dream come true.
title: Dancing on Thin Ice with Torvill & Dean
